div.p: PALACE IN VEGAS. INFO ON BILLO’REILLY.COM.
TIP OF THE DAY. OUR LATEST IN BILL O’REILLY.COM
HILLARY CLINTON ASKING ABOUT BENGHAZI WAS A NASTY DISPLAY.
BUT IT WAS OKAY WITH 62% OF THOSE WHO ANSWERED THE POLL.
38% SAID THE DISPLAY WAS WRONG. 30,000 VOTED.
NOW, IF YOU DON’T LIKE SOMEONE THAT’S A MOTIVATING FACTOR
THAT’S WHY THE POLL CAME OUT THAT WAY.
FOLKS WHO DON’T APPROVE MRS. CLINTON MADE THEIR OPINION
KNOWN. IF YOU’RE IN IT TO WIN IT
HATE IS A MOTIVATOR, BUT NOT A PATHWAY TO VICTORY.
GEORGE WASHINGTON, BEST EXAMPLE OF THAT.
ABE LINCOLN, SECOND BEST. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, CHECK THE
HATE. NOT GOING TO WIN WITH IT.
THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
FACTOR WEBSITE, DIFFERENT FROM BILL O’REILLY.COM.
